name: Project Bleuler
description:
Project Bleuler is an interactive psychological thriller developed for PC.

You're trapped in a house where the exit seems not to exist, your head hurts, you don't know where you are, what happened to you or who you are. Things are getting mad or maybe it's you? Will you be able to solve our game and find out what's happening?

Cordyceps Studio is made up with 5 videogame students from ENTI, Barcelona.

Team:

-Game Design & concept artist: Adrià Altarriba @a_altarribab

- Game Design: Joan Maeso

-3d artist & music: Aleix Cansell @AleixCansell

-Developer: Gabri Besen

-3d artist & producer: Enric Martinez @martinezenricm

You are allowed to make let's plays and whatever you want!

If there's anything you want to let us know, please comment below.

Thanks for playing!
